body_html:
There are some more docs in the torch.distributed section and you can look into the imagenet example.

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body_text:
There are some more docs in the torch.distributed section and you can look into the imagenet example.
Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on our forums.
body:
There are some more docs in the [`torch.distributed` section](http://pytorch.org/docs/master/distributed.html#initialization) and you can look into the [imagenet example](https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py).

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](discuss.pytorch.org).
